example.text: I introduced the Saving Gig Economy Taxpayers Act in May of 2021 to restore the threshold to levels that were working just fine before Democrats complicated the system and gave taxpayers new headaches. This bill will allow the Republican-controlled House of Representatives more time to raise this threshold, fix this Democrat-created issue, and prevent 30 to 50 million new forms from being sent out next month.

The Limit, Save, Grow Act is the solution to the debt limit problem & saves $4.8 trillion over the next decade. Senate Dems & Pres Biden must work with [[user]] to sign it into law. There’s too much at stake to be political. Our childrens economic success depends on it.

This bill will not only ensure that our troops will not be discharged for refusing the COVID vaccine but will invest in our brave servicemembers and address the impact of inflation on their families by providing a 4.6% pay raise. Repealing the mandate was a step in the right direction.

With another out-of-touch speech, he celebrated the inflation-causing liberal policies forced on Americans instead of focusing on how to help struggling families and small businesses across the country. Thus proving why the American people elected a Republican House majority who is working on policies that help real Americans.

Now my colleagues and I will work on reinstating everyone who has been discharged and forced out of the military because of failure to comply with the mandate. The NDAA is the primary way Congress can support our men and women in uniform and it is past time we properly honor our military personnel that put their lives on the line for our nation.

I joined [[user]] for a field hearing in New York on trade in America. We need strong domestic trade policies so the US can be competitive in the global market. We’re protecting US jobs by holding China accountable for their unfair & often inhumane work conditions. [[url]]

Now my colleagues and I will work on reinstating everyone who has been discharged and forced out of the military because of failure to comply with the mandate. The NDAA is the primary way Congress can support our men and women in uniform and it is past time we properly honor our military personnel that put their lives on the line for our nation.
